testcase.name: To Verify the Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User Launched "http://demo.rapidtestpro.com/login.php" in Browser.....passed And Application base page is displayed with Login Username and Password Fields.passed When User enters Username : "1234556666" , Password : "MavDemo@01"..........passed And Clicks on the submit button.............................................passed Then Application page is displayed with PIN Number Field....................passed When User enters PIN : "12345"..............................................passed And Clicks on the validate PIN..............................................passed Then User Verifies the application is logged in successfully................passed
